message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product.  Given its value, I believe a price of $13,000 is fair. What do you think?

I appreciate your time and consideration, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $11,000 is quite a bit lower than I had in mind.  Could we possibly agree on $12,000? It's a fair compromise.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm getting close to my budget, but I'd like to try to get a bit closer to my target price. Would you be willing to meet me at $11,500? I think it's a fair price for both of us.
